alarm_scope = #{alarmScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update unicom_alarm_library_wcdma set alarm_meaning = #{alarmMeaning,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alarm_level_id = #{alarmLevelId,jdbcType=TINYINT}, alarm_type = #{alarmType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alarm_scope = #{alarmScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recommend = #{recommend,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where alarm_name = #{alarmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT alarm_name alarmName, alarm_meaning alarmMeaning, alarm_level_id alarmLevelId, alarm_type alarmType, alarm_scope alarmScope, recommend FROM unicom_alarm_library_wcdma;

> SELECT alarm_name alarmName, alarm_meaning alarmMeaning, alarm_level_id alarmLevelId, alarm_type alarmType, alarm_scope alarmScope, recommend FROM unicom_alarm_library_wcdma WHERE alarm_name = #{alarmName};
mapper.update:
UPDATE unicom_alarm_library_wcdma
alarm_meaning = #{param.alarmMeaning,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alarm_level_id = #{param.alarmLevelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alarm_type = #{param.alarmType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alarm_scope = #{param.alarmScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

WHERE alarm_name = #{alarmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
